welcome_message_body: "Welcome to McKinleyville, where the charm of small-town America meets the breathtaking beauty of the coast. Get ready to experience our famous redwood forests, stunning beaches, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arcata Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Arcata Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Murray Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Murray Field Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
